items.sentence: Pass the ball quickly to a person behind you.
Even if Tom saw us, he wouldn't say anything.
Tom turned the barn into a bed and breakfast.
Tom is reading a collection of short stories.
Why did you guys think Tom liked heavy metal?
My mother came, but my father stayed at home.
Tom knows that he has to do that, doesn't he?
Tom is always asking me to buy him something.
Regardless of what Tom does, he does it well.
Did you tell Tom what I told you to tell him?
